segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is calm, almost serene, as she polishes the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t help feeling a twinge of anxiety watching the water overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor keeps expanding, yet she remains blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she doesn't notice her foot is already soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight coming through the window makes everything seem so peaceful outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet inside, there’s a quiet chaos brewing with those children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies like it’s some daring mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks precarious, like he could tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s the girl, eagerly waiting for her share, both innocent and clever.
segments.speaker: PAR
